pageContext.claim: “So we have our best poll numbers today that we've ever had. Can you imagine how good our poll numbers -- with all the things that we've done -- how good our numbers would be if we had just a fair media?”
pageContext.analysis: It's unclear what poll Trump is referencing but he has a habit of cherry-picking polls. Trump's approval ratings have basically been flat for a year, with roughly 42 percent of Americans approving of his performance and 53 percent disapproving, according to the blended poll rating developed by FiveThirtyEight.
